title: STI 6MT Fluid Capacity
body: 3.5 - 4.1 Liters (3.7 - 4.3 Quarts) depending on year.

title: NA_5MT_TY752_TY753
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY752/TY753
Notes: Phase 1 era NA 5MT family

title: NA_5MT_TY754
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY754
Notes: Stronger than early; common

title: NA_5MT_TY755
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.90/4.11
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY755
Notes: Final drive varies by model; match rear diff

title: WRX_5MT_390
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY754
Notes: Classic WRX 5MT; reliability risk at high power

title: WRX_5MT_370
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 5
Final Drive: 3.70
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: TY755
Notes: Unique 3.70 FD; must match rear diff

title: AUTO_4EAT_390_P1
body:
Type: AT
Gears: 4
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: 4EAT
Notes: Early 4EAT; match rear diff

title: AUTO_4EAT_411_P2
body:
Type: AT
Gears: 4
Final Drive: 4.11
Center Diff: Viscous
Family: 4EAT
Notes: Later 4EAT; common

title: STI_6MT_TY856
body:
Type: MT
Gears: 6
Final Drive: 3.90
Center Diff: DCCD
Family: TY856
Notes: Requires R180 3.90 and STI driveline parts; pull-type clutch

title: R160_390
body:
Family: R160
Final Drive: 3.90
LSD: Open (some WRX viscous LSD)
Notes: Match trans FD

title: R160_411
body:
Family: R160
Final Drive: 4.11
LSD: Open
Notes: Match 4EAT 4.11

title: R160_370
body:
Family: R160
Final Drive: 3.70
LSD: Some viscous LSD
Notes: Unique; common swap trap

title: R180_390
body:
Family: R180
Final Drive: 3.90
LSD: Clutch LSD
Notes: Requires STI axles/hubs or hybrid conversion

title: FD_MATCH
body:
Severity: error
Message: Final drive mismatch (front vs rear).
Condition: trans.finalDrive != rearDiff.finalDrive

title: STI6_R180
body:
Severity: error
Message: STI 6MT requires R180 3.90 rear diff.
Condition: trans == STI_6MT AND rearDiff != R180_390

title: TURBO_XMEM
body:
Severity: error
Message: Turbo up-pipe/exhaust hits NA crossmember.
Condition: engine.isTurbo AND crossmember == NA

title: DBW_REQ
body:
Severity: error
Message: DBW engine needs pedal + wiring + ECU support.
Condition: engine.requiresDBW AND DBW_Planned == false

title: IMMOB
body:
Severity: error
Message: Immobilizer requires ECU+key+cluster match (or delete).
Condition: engine.hasImmobilizer AND Immobilizer_Planned == false

title: 5MT_TORQUE_RISK
4EAT_HEAT
body:
Severity: mods
Message: 4EAT needs trans cooler/heat management.
Condition: trans is 4EAT AND engine.isTurbo

title: WRX 5MT Fluid Capacity
body: 3.5 Liters (3.7 Quarts)

title: WRX 2015-2021 Trans Fluid Capacity
body: 3.3 Liters (3.5 Quarts)
